text:
[Verse]
Morning light breaks slow
Dreams that start to glow
Chasing shadows low
Where do they all go

[Verse 2]
Walking down the street
Echoes in the beat
Feet that never meet
Heart skips on repeat

[Chorus]
Chasing shadows fast
Memories they last
Moments moving past
Catch them if you can

[Bridge]
Sunset dripping gold
Stories never told
Days that we unfold
In this life we hold

[Verse 3]
Steps beneath the moon
Humming midnight tune
Shadows gone too soon
Maybe they’ll be back in June

[Chorus]
Chasing shadows fast
Memories they last
Moments moving past
Catch them if you can
title: Chasing Shadows
